headline: Yang and Gabbard Siphoning Key Independents in New Hampshire
abstract: The Granite State’s young people, libertarians and independent voters helped power Bernie Sanders to a primary victory in 2016. This time, some of them are eyeing Andrew Yang and Tulsi Gabbard.
lead_paragraph: PLYMOUTH, N.H. — Tim Smith is 35, relatively young compared with other voters. He calls himself an independent, which is common here in New Hampshire. And he’s uneasy about the political establishment and Democratic Party standard-bearers.
